sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import useFormData from '../custom-hooks/useFormData' import User from '../api' const SignUp = ({addUser}) => { const INITIAL_STATE = { username: "", password: "", email: "" } const [formData, setFormData, handleChange] = useFormData(INITIAL_STATE) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const {username, password, email} = formData User.register(username, password, email) setFormData(INITIAL_STATE) } return (
) } export default SignUp
